channel.title: Fishing
channel.description:
I am trying to make a fishing base for my server, i have added a fishing void and many methods for it such as a void for catching the fish, requirements, requirements for levels, adding fish to the inventory and deleting bait, etc. Now the only problem is that i am trying to get the second option for the fishing spot to work, now since the fishing spots i am using are npc's i have to use case 17: which is a method for the clicking of the second option on an npc, which for me, the second option is "Bait."
Now the fishing spot has two options for clicking (not including examine,) which are "Lure," and "Bait," i have lure working properly as with all the other fishing spots first options, but i can't get any of the fishing spots second options to work.
From my prospective, i highly doubt i will get help with this, which is why i will keep trying to get it working, so if someone can be arsed and knows how to get the second option on fishing spots to work thanks, a lot.

item.title: Fishing
item.description:
@11167 wrote:

The second click NPC packet should work, which is why I’d have to agree with Chassy and ask for the codes used.

Read full topic

item.title: Fishing
item.dc:creator: @chassy13 Chassy13
item.description:
@chassy13 wrote:

Can you show us any attempts of written code you have tried? There might just be something wrong on how you wrote it.

Read full topic

item.title: Fishing

From my prospective, i highly doubt i will get help with this, which is why i will keep trying to get it working, so if someone can be arsed and knows how to get the second option on fishing spots to work thanks, a lot.
